result.eng: What do you do for living?
result.html: Cén tslí bheatha atá agatWhat do you do for living?
result.ponchtml: Cén tslí ḃeaṫa atá agatWhat do you do for living?

result.eng: Our life on earth is temporary.
result.ga: Is neamhbhuan ár mbeatha ar talamh
result.orig: Is neamhbhuan ár mbeatha ar talamh
result.html: Is neamhbhuan ár mbeatha ar talamhOur life on earth is temporary.
result.ponchtml: Is neaṁḃuan ár mbeaṫa ar talaṁOur life on earth is temporary.

result.eng: My occupation? I am a teacher.
result.ga: Mo shlí bheatha Is múinteoir mé
result.orig: Mo shlí bheatha Is múinteoir mé
result.html: Mo shlí bheatha Is múinteoir méMy occupation? I am a teacher.
result.ponchtml: Mo ẛlí ḃeaṫa Is múinteoir méMy occupation? I am a teacher.

result.eng: A bottle of whiskey was put in front of him.
result.html: Leagadh buidéal uisce beatha roimheA bottle of whiskey was put in front of him.
result.ponchtml: Leagaḋ buidéal uisce beaṫa roiṁeA bottle of whiskey was put in front of him.

result.eng: They drank some of the whiskey.
result.ga: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beatha
result.orig: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beatha
result.html: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beathaThey drank some of the whiskey.
result.ponchtml: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beaṫaThey drank some of the whiskey.

result.eng: Hardly any professional journalist is able to make a career out of blogging.
result.ga: Is beag iriseoir gairmiúil atá ábalta a bheatha a bhaint i dtír leis an bhlagadóireacht
result.orig: Is beag iriseoir gairmiúil atá ábalta a bheatha a bhaint i dtír leis an bhlagadóireacht
result.html: Is beag iriseoir gairmiúil atá ábalta a bheatha a bhaint i dtír leis an bhlagadóireachtHardly any professional journalist is able to make a career out of blogging.
result.ponchtml: Is beag iriseoir gairmiúil atá ábalta a ḃeaṫa a ḃaint i dtír leis an ḃlagadóireaċtHardly any professional journalist is able to make a career out of blogging.

result.html: Sé do bheatha 'un an bhaileWelcome home.
result.ponchtml: Sé do ḃeaṫa 'un an ḃaileWelcome home.
